channel.title: CVE Feed for SmartSoft -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SmartSoft -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37288|2024-10-23T18:44:54.122Z -- smartsoft -- smartbpm.net
item.description: SmartBPM.NET component has a vulnerability of path traversal within its file download function. An unauthenticated remote attacker can exploit this vulnerability to access arbitrary system files.
